survey_name: Gen Z Workplace Technology Preferences Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the technology preferences and expectations of Gen Z employees in the workplace, focusing on tools, communication platforms, and digital collaboration methods.

questions.question_text: Which of the following workplace technologies do you use most frequently?
answer_options: Video conferencing tools (e.g., Zoom, Microsoft Teams)
Cloud storage and collaboration tools (e.g., Google Drive, Dropbox)
questions.client_notes: This question helps identify the most commonly used technologies among Gen Z employees. Ensure answer options cover popular tools.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a MULTI_CHOICE field type to allow respondents to select multiple options.
